metadata.title: CVE-2020-21678 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A global buffer overflow in the genmp_writefontmacro_latex component in genmp.c of fig2dev 3.2.7b allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) via converting a xfig file into mp format.

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
